issue.title: [C++] Support creating AsyncScanner from a single fragment
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12664](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12664). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently there is a fallback in ScannerBuilder::Finish that ignores use_async if creating a scanner from a single fragment as I wasn't sure if that method was going to stick around.  Given ARROW-12231 it seems likely that method will stay so we should support creating an AsyncScanner from this.
